meta.article_title: April 19, 2021 - Imagine a Score or Situation

imagine-a-score-or-situation.probleme: Playing best at a specific score or situation

intermediaire: Imagine the psychology that allows you to play best at that score or situation.

exercices_complementaires.description: Visualize yourself playing well in different situations.

metriques_progression: Learn to match that psychology no matter what the score or situation is.
